snippet: California’s new law is a sign that enlightened lawmaking is possible in American politics.
abstract: Editorial praises California law that will speed up confiscation of firearms from estimated 20,000 people who bought them legally but were later disqualified; contends law is sign that enlightened lawmaking unhindered by gun lobby scare tactics and Capitol Hill filibustering is possible in American politics.
lead_paragraph: California’s new law is a sign that enlightened lawmaking is possible in American politics.
